attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you, or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-in's accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
All our vehicles at Kia Umhlanga undergo a 125 quality point check, DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history . We believe in EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.

attributes.description: All our cars come standard with a 6 year 150 000km Warranty. Contact us for further information or to book a test drive. Nash Nissan is committed to bringing you quality New, PreOwned and Demo vehicles. Our vehicles are quality checked and undergo the roadworthiness test prior to delivery of the vehicle. All tradeins are welcome, we pay fair market related prices. Finance is available through all major finance providers and our team will tailor the deal to suit your needs. Nash Nissan is a division of Super Group whereby we are committed to earning your trust and building relationships.
